mapper.insert: insert into `agent` (id, username, password, company, channel, contact, contactPhone, address, comment, balance) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{balance,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update `agent` set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel = #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contactPhone = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, company, channel, contact, contactPhone, address, comment, balance from `agent` where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, username, password, company, channel, contact, contactPhone, address, comment, balance from `agent`
